description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. It's time for 2D Voxel Madness to the EXTREME! Build expansive worlds, fight evil enemies, and search for treasure in this 2D Voxel world. Nothing is unpossible as you fashion new worlds all your own. This is a great game to play if you enjoy platformers, mining, or fun.
description.short: It's time for 2D Voxel Madness to the EXTREME! Build expansive worlds, fight evil enemies, and search for treasure in this 2D Voxel world. Nothing is unpossible as you fashion new worlds all your own. This is a great game to play if you enjoy platformers, mining, or fun.
